channel.title: e-Discovery Zone
channel.description: Welcome to the e-Discovery Zone, presented by TechLaw Solutions, featuring content discussing trends, key developments and their impact on the litigation process.
channel.itunes:author: info@techlawsolutions.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: TechLaw Solutions e-Discovery Zone is a collection of resources and material to inform and educate on the e-Discovery and litigation process.
channel.itunes:summary:
TechLaw Solutions e-Discovery Zone is a collection of resources and material to inform and educate on the e-Discovery and litigation process.
The Audiocast show is hosted by e-Discovery experts Tom OConnor, Director of The LEDI, and Browning Marean, Partner at DLA Piper; it features a variety of guests, including Industry Experts, Counsel, Attorneys, and Judges. We hope you enjoy the show!

item.title: Audiocast 11-4-2010
item.description: Special Guest Brett Burney, Independent Consultant, Burney Consultants. Topics: Challenges of small and medium-size cases, Corporations playing a more active role, Are RFP's asking the right questions?, Legal project management - on the rise?, Vendors bringing project discipline, ABA Tech Show and iPad application growth
item.itunes:author: TechLaw Solutions
item.itunes:subtitle: Special Guest Brett Burney, Independent Consultant, Burney Consultants.
item.itunes:summary: Special Guest Brett Burney, Independent Consultant, Burney Consultants. Topics: Challenges of small and medium-size cases, Corporations playing a more active role, Are RFP's asking the right questions?, Legal project management - on the rise?, Vendors bringing project discipline, ABA Tech Show and iPad application growth
item.itunes:keywords: ediscovery, electronic discovery, litigation support, litigation consulting

item.title: Live from ILTA
item.description: Special Guest Duane Lites, Director of Litigation Support, Jackson Walker L.L.P. Topics: ILTA 2010 recap, SaaS traction and cloud computing, Certification and scope of competencies, e-Discovery and social media, Involving the litigation support team earlier, Handling small and medium size cases
item.itunes:author: TechLaw Solutions
item.itunes:subtitle: Special Guest Duane Lites, Director of Litigation Support, Jackson Walker L.L.P.

item.title: Audiocast 8-24-2010
item.description: Special Guest David Kessler, Partner and e-Discovery Counsel, Fulbright Jaworski. Topics: Pension Committee case impact on preservation, Regulatory requirements and document management, Iterative approach to e-Discovery, Cooperation Proclamation progress, Early e-Discovery education in law schools?, Data governance, risk, compliance

item.title: Audiocast 5-14-2010
item.description: Special Guest George Socha, e-Discovery Consultant. Topics: 2010 EDRM kickoff and EDRM history, "E-Discovery is not the monster, its the approach", 7th Circuit pilot program and Duke conference, 8th e-Discovery industry survey, 3 key components - technology, process, people, Update of the 8 EDRM projects
item.itunes:author: TechLaw Solutions
item.itunes:subtitle: Special Guest George Socha, e-Discovery Consultant.

item.title: Audiocast 3-31-2010
item.description: Special Guest Judge Andrew Peck, US Magistrate Judge, Southern District of NY. Topics: Cooperation and thoughts on sanctions, Proportionality and shaping of the discovery process, Competency and expertise with ESI, "Rocket Docket" considerations, Corporate counsel and the 26(f) "meet-and-confer"
item.itunes:author: TechLaw Solutions
item.itunes:subtitle: Special Guest Judge Andrew Peck, US Magistrate Judge, Southern District of NY.

item.itunes:keywords: ediscovery, electronic discovery, litigation support, litigation consulting
